statements: SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM heart_rate_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, age, gender, bmi, heart_condition FROM health_metrics
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM health_metrics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT AVG(bmi) AS avg_bmi, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_condition = True;
SELECT * FROM heart_rate_data JOIN health_metrics ON heart_rate_data.user_id = health_metrics.user_id ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM HeartRateData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT heart_rate, timestamp FROM HeartRateData WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) FROM Patient GROUP BY gender;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM HealthAssessment WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM HeartRateData WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM HealthAssessment WHERE recommendation ILIKE '%health%' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, height, weight FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT hr.id, hr.timestamp, hr.heart_rate, p.age, p.gender FROM HeartRateData hr INNER JOIN Patient p ON hr.id = p.id WHERE hr.heart_rate < 60 ORDER BY hr.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, MAX(date_of_birth) AS latest_dob FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM health_assessment WHERE heart_rate_variability > 10;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT heart_rate, recorded_at FROM heart_rate_data ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, assessment_date, heart_rate_variability FROM health_assessment WHERE heart_rate_variability > 3.5;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM doctor_records WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM HeartRateData WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, device_type, manufacturer FROM DeviceInfo ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, condition_name, diagnosed_date FROM HealthConditions WHERE diagnosed_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_duration FROM SleepData WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY date
SELECT user_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM HeartRateData WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M'
SELECT user_id, device_type, manufacturer FROM DeviceInfo WHERE device_type LIKE 'Fit%'
SELECT user_id, condition_name, diagnosed_date FROM HealthConditions WHERE diagnosed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, date, sleep_duration FROM SleepData WHERE sleep_duration > 6 ORDER BY date ASC
